name: Dread of Sleep
description:
You find yourself in an endless cycle of nightmares. Fight to survive as the line between reality and dream shatters.

This is my entry for the CFN game jam.

How to Play: 

WASD - Move

LMB - Attack

RMB - Interact

A nightmare ends once your focus bar is filled. It will fill faster if you are standing still or moving slowly. 

Use your TV to buy useful items!
